translation.en: Your time. Right, let's have it, boys, yeah?
We're here in London for the final stop of the Stereo Dream world tour.
translation.ko: 스테레오 드림 월드 투어가 런던에서 대단원을 장식합니다

translation.en: The fans cannot get enough of those five boys,
led by the edgy, the mysterious Vinnie D and the boy-next-door, Austin.
translation.ko: "비니 D, 오스틴 라이언, 마일로, 조니" 신비주의 매력을 지닌 비니 D와 훈남 오스틴이 이끄는 그룹이죠 "브릭스턴 아레나 스테레오 드림 월드 투어"

translation.en: Come on then, boys. Energy, yeah? Energy! Let's go!
translation.ko: 가자, 얘들아 에너지 보여줘, 알지? 간다!

translation.en: You do live music here, yeah?
It's not finished yet, but you get the vibe.
-Um… -[Vinnie] I could play it live for you.
Yeah, I think we're good for now, but, um…
How does anything get picked up if you don't wanna listen?
translation.ko: 곡도 안 들으면 인재를 어떻게 발굴해요?

translation.en: -[Vinnie] It's a demo. It's a bit rough. -Yeah. No, no, I can hear that. Um…
translation.ko: - 데모 버전이에요 - 네 - 더 다듬을 거예요 - 그럴 것 같았어요

translation.en: -[Vinnie] But you get the idea? -I absolutely do.
-Um. Yeah. -[Vinnie] Yeah, what do you think?
It's gonna be a no from us.
It's cyclical, you know? The music scene.
So it's just… wait for it to circle back around.
-[Vinnie] A couple of weeks? -Uh, bigger circles.
♪ Down in your bones ♪ ♪ Do you toss and turn… ♪
[man] Look, the only way you'll ever end up on our radar
is if you have complete songs and the numbers to back it up.
[man] Like a few hundred thousand followers on Instagram or TikTok.
translation.ko: 인스타그램이나 틱톡 팔로워가 수십만 명은 돼야죠

translation.en: Hey, check this out. It's not finished yet, but you get the vibe.
I get that, but it's not our thing.
Vinnie D! How far the mighty have fallen!
translation.ko: 비니 D! 그 잘나가던 남자가 다 죽었네

translation.en: Now look at ya. Busking off Rye Lane.
translation.ko: 꼴 좀 봐요 라이 레인에서 버스킹이라니

translation.en: No, I'm not busking… I'm practicing.
Oh, go on then, be like that then. Prick.
Well, your hair looks shit anyway. You should go back to your blond boy-band look.
translation.ko: 헤어스타일 거지 같아요 금발 아이돌일 때가 나았지

translation.en: Pound a bowl! Pound a bowl!
Get your tomatoes, fresh tomatoes. And your peppers!
-[music stops] -Yo… My bro, I'm trying to practice, man.
Yo, keep it in time, man.
Where did you go? I was looking for you.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean to shout, but, please, I was looking for you for ages.
translation.ko: 소리쳐서 미안한데 내가 얼마나 찾았는지 알아?

translation.en: I'm sorry. Come on. Let's go.
Listen, he shouldn't be out here on his own. I'm sorry if he disturbed you.
translation.ko: 혼자 다니면 안 되는 아이예요 방해됐다면 죄송합니다

translation.en: He didn't disturb me. But that was awesome.
I was walking up and down the street. I couldn't find you.
[presenter] …some amazing things up in the Lake District, didn't he?
translation.ko: 레이크 디스트릭트에서 멋진 일이 벌어지고 있어요

translation.en: We'll find out more about that on Sunday night.
translation.ko: 일요일 저녁에 더 많은 소식 전해드리죠

translation.en: [presenter 2] Now, we are delighted to welcome to the studio,
translation.ko: 이제 스튜디오에 특별한 손님을 초대해 볼까요?

translation.en: -[presenter 2] It's great to see you. -[Austin] Thanks for having me.
[presenter 2] So this is it. You're releasing your final album
And of course you have the farewell tour coming up too.
Yeah, yeah, it's been a long ride. I guess I've been very blessed.
[presenter] The fans are going to be very gutted that it's the last one.
How do you feel about that? Are you gonna miss performing?
[Austin] The fans have been good to me over the years.
Music has been my life, and it's given me everything.
translation.ko: 음악은 제 인생이자 제게 모든 걸 줬으니까요

translation.en: [presenter] Yes, from your days with Stereo Dream to your amazing solo career.
translation.ko: 맞아요, 스테레오 드림을 시작으로 멋진 솔로 활동을 해오셨죠

translation.en: Now that you're winding down, Austin, do you have any regrets?
translation.ko: 경력의 마지막을 앞두고 후회되는 점이 있으실까요?

translation.en: I definitely regret those shocking hairstyles we had in Stereo Dream.
translation.ko: 그야 스테레오 드림 시절 우스꽝스러운 헤어스타일이죠

translation.en: [presenter] Thank you so much for joining us…
Hiya. What can I get you?
Yeah, please. Can I have a, um… cider, please?
translation.ko: 네, 주문할게요, 그… 사과주 한 잔요

translation.en: D'you know, just… a half-pint will be all right, you know?
translation.ko: 저기요 반 잔만 마셔도 될 것 같아요

translation.en: I, um… saw you've got a new live music night starting up and…
translation.ko: 그… 여기서 새 라이브 공연이 열리는 것 같던데

translation.en: Not everyone gets to perform at Peckham's Finest.
translation.ko: 아무나 공연할 수 있는 무대는 아니에요

translation.en: Yeah. I mean for me it's not really about getting to perform.
translation.ko: 그렇죠, 사실 공연 자격에는 별 관심이 없고요

translation.en: You probably don't recognize me, but…
-I used to be… -Vinnie D. Stereo Dream.
Anyway, I'm finally working on my solo album.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 제가 드디어 솔로 앨범을 작업 중이에요

translation.en: But, yeah, I just need a couple cozy, intimate venues like this
translation.ko: 그래서 투어를 시작하기 전에 여기처럼 아늑한 곳에서

translation.en: to perform at before I go on tour.
Look, Big Dave, he chooses who plays and… he's quite picky, so…
translation.ko: 공연 관리는 빅 데이브가 하는데 꽤 까다로워요

translation.en: I… I think you made a mistake.
-I just wanted a… -It's on the house, Vinnie D.
translation.ko: - 반 잔만… - 제가 드리는 거예요 비니 D

translation.en: Vinnie D. He used to be the lead singer of Stereo Dream.
translation.ko: 비니 D라고 20년 전에 보이 밴드 스테레오 드림에서

translation.en: A boy band from 20 years ago. Anyway, look…
He's got material for his solo album, which he wants to showcase here.
translation.ko: 솔로 앨범 곡을 선보이고 싶다고 해서요

translation.en: [bartender] He'll bring in a whole bunch of new punters.
Hi, Vinnie. Um, it's Mum. I know it's been a while.
[sighs] It's Ted's birthday next week. Um…
And I'll be going to see him and I thought you might want to come.
translation.ko: 만나러 갈 건데 같이 갈까 해서 연락했어

translation.en: Are you here for the, uh…?
-I think I'm lost, you know. -And now you are found. Come.
Oh, he can have my own.
Sit here, my friend. You are welcome.
We play the heartbeat again… My brother, what is your name?
translation.ko: 심장 박동 연주부터 하죠 친구분 성함이?

translation.en: [Dia] We go again, and this time,
I want Vince to be the heartbeat.
Everyone, I want you to breathe together.
You will feel it soon, my friend.
Boom goes the fire and the morning sun.
translation.ko: 꽝 하는 건 불, 그리고 아침 햇살

translation.en: My brother, take off your jewelry.
♪ Achong ma ne chung, hey ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung, hey ♪
-♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Welcome the day! -♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Welcome the day!
-♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Yes, sir. -♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Let's go!
-♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -Four, three. ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
-[Dia] Well done. That's the one. -Well done, darling.
It looks like Stevie has a new friend, huh?
Stevie? Come on, baby. Let's go.
Oh, and by the way, sing a little bit lower next time.
translation.ko: 아, 그리고요 다음엔 음을 좀 낮춰봐요

translation.en: [Ted] We saved you the VIP seat.
VIP? That's a bit fancy, Ted.
-A harmonica? Did you say thank you? -No.
Remember. Don't rush. Take your time.
[mum] Well done, Ted. Well done, Vince.
[woman] Mr. Denham. You've been unemployed for a while now.
translation.ko: 데넘 씨 실직하신 지 꽤 됐네요

translation.en: And I see you have no musical training at all.
No, I just always had an instinct for it.
More of a Lennon than McCartney.
It might help having other options.
-About Peckham's Finest. -Do you want a drink? Because if not…
translation.ko: - 공연 말인데요 - 술 마실 거 아니면…

translation.en: No, I do. I do. But I need to show you something first. Check this out.
translation.ko: 마실 거예요 그 전에 이거부터 보세요

translation.en: See that? I've got an online following.
They're all fans and they're all local. Imagine the bar take.
translation.ko: 다 이 지역 팬들이에요 수입 장난 아니겠죠?

translation.en: Next one's in a couple of weeks.
If you can't bring the kid, you can forget about it.
No, he'll be there. He'll be there, I promise. All right?
[laughs] Okay, you two, not bad. Not bad.
Listen, we're finished for today. Until next week.
translation.ko: 자, 오늘은 이쯤 하고 다음 주에 또 보죠

translation.en: -Put your stuff away, okay? Be right back. -All right.
Hey, Stevie, man, can I show you something?
Look, bro. Now check this out, man. Look.
You see? That's me. That's you.
And it's on its way to, like, 100,000 views or whatever.
And because of this, I got us a gig at Peckham's Finest.
If we're gonna do it, we need to practice, man.
We need to rehearse, rehearse, rehearse.
I never had a gig in my entire life.
Yeah, this is your chance, dude.
In front of a real audience.
Look, I was in a band once, you know?
With my experience and your drumming,
I don't like big crowds and sudden things.
translation.ko: 사람 많은 거랑 갑작스러운 거 싫어해요

translation.en: Don't be scared, man. We can change that. I can help you.
translation.ko: 겁내지 마, 그건 극복하면 돼 내가 도와줄게

translation.en: -Hey, have you got your own drum kit? -Yes, Vince.
Yeah, Mum. Vinnie and I are gonna do a gig.
translation.ko: 네, 엄마 비니랑 같이 공연하기로 했어요

translation.en: -Ignore him. -Wait, wait, wait! Let me show you this.
translation.ko: - 무시해, 벨트 매고 - 잠깐만요, 이거 봐주세요!

translation.en: ♪ Lord, won't you take my hand… ♪
♪ Lead me to the promised land… ♪
Is she one of them hotline babes?
Never mind. Look, Stevie. Stevie, I need to level with you, okay?
Dude, what do you want more than anything else in this entire world?
translation.ko: 야, 너 이 세상에서 가장 원하는 게 뭐야?

translation.en: Maybe I can help you with it. Come on.
I want to go to music school.
Right. Listen, if we do this gig,
it's going to open up some real opportunities for you, man.
I've got some really important people coming down.
No? All right, well, he's a really big deal.
All right, and if we impress him, Stevie,
we might be able to go on tour.
Imagine me and you on tour together.
[Stevie's mum] Is someone at the door?
Stevie, this is something I've been trying to get back for a long time.
translation.ko: 스티비, 난 오래전부터 이 기회를 기다려 왔거든?

translation.en: I really need your help with this.
How you doing? It's nice to see ya.
-What are you doing here? -I invited him for a cup of tea.
It's… funny… My… My brother used to do that as well.
Couldn't wait to get to the jammy bit.
Oh God, I'm… I'm really sorry to hear that.
Yeah? You don't dance anymore, no?
Vince is in a famous band, Mum.
I was but… yeah. Things change.
What famous band was that then?
Do you know, um, Stereo Dream?
Austin Roberts is going to be at the gig when we perform.
translation.ko: 우리 공연할 때 오스틴 로버츠도 온대요

translation.en: There's not going to be a gig, Stevie. Can you please stop mentioning that?
translation.ko: 공연할 일 없어 공연 얘기 좀 안 하면 안 돼?

translation.en: -Well actually what? What are you doing? -I'm only trying…
translation.ko: 사실 뭐요? - 뭐 하시는 거예요? - 전 그냥…

translation.en: No, no, no, you have no idea that you're putting him in a dangerous situation.
translation.ko: 아뇨, 스티비를 위험한 상황에 내몰고 있잖아요

translation.en: Do you understand? I can't have that.
He wants to perform and… he needs an audience. He said it before.
translation.ko: 본인이 공연하고 싶다잖아요 관객 앞에서 보여주고 싶댔어요

translation.en: -Stevie, tell her, mate. -He has no idea what that involves.
translation.ko: - 스티비, 말씀드려 - 잘 모르고 하는 소리죠

translation.en: Please don't come here and start putting ideas into his head.
translation.ko: 내 집에 와서 애한테 이상한 생각 심지 마요

translation.en: What are you talking about? This is his future.
That's not for you to say.
Other than drumming, do you know anything about his life?
translation.ko: 드럼 치는 거 말고 스티비에 대해 아는 거 있어요?
자폐에 대해 아는 게 하나라도 있냐고요

translation.en: You know what? Look at this.
I really don't want to see it. I'm not interested.
[Stevie's mum] I'm not letting you interfere with his life.
You know, I'm giving him an opportunity and now you're holding him back.
translation.ko: 난 기회를 주려는 거고 어머님이 그걸 막는 거죠

translation.en: [Stevie's mum] You don't know Stevie at all.
[Vinnie] If you don't let him follow his dreams, he's going to stay like this.
translation.ko: 꿈을 좇게 해주지 않으면 평생 이렇게 살 거예요

translation.en: -[Stevie's mum] Stay like what? -[Vinnie] You know what.
translation.ko: 이렇게 사는 게 어때서요? - 무슨 뜻인지 알잖아요 - 몰라요

translation.en: [Stevie's mum] I don't. You have all the answers. Go on, like what?
translation.ko: 모르는 게 없나 본데 어디 한번 말해봐요

translation.en: Tea time's over. I think it's time you should go.
Oh my God, Stevie. Stevie? Stevie? Stevie? Stevie? Stevie?
Sorry. Sorry, baby. Stevie? Stevie, just take a deep breath. Deep breath.
-Is he okay? -I just need to find his… his sticks.
I'll be back in one second, okay? I'm just gonna go and find them.
One second. Don't… move or do… Don't do anything.
translation.ko: 잠깐이면 돼 움직이지 마요 그냥 가만히 있어요

translation.en: Stevie, are you all right, mate?
Stevie. Stevie, remember that Dia song?
♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
-[both] ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ -[Vinnie] Yes. [both] ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪ ♪ Achong ma ne chung ♪
That's it. Take your time, man.
It is, innit? I just need to write some killer lyrics.
translation.ko: 그렇지? 이제 죽이는 가사만 있으면 되는데

translation.en: And I'm loving those tins, dude.
Yes. I love the sound they make.
Yeah. Me too. And it'll make you stand out.
translation.ko: 맞아, 나도 좋아 너만의 개성이 될 거야
키스 재럿이랑 같이 재즈 연주를 해요

translation.en: I also like Bach. But he's not a drummer.
Just… keep practicing, mate, and you'll be the next Bach before you know it.
translation.ko: 앞으로 꾸준히 연습하면 어느새 바흐가 되어 있을 거야

translation.en: Why would I want to be Bach? I'm me.
translation.ko: 바흐가 돼서 뭐 해요? 난 나예요

translation.en: It's not about being you, is it? It's about being someone.
translation.ko: 그게 중요한 게 아니야 특별한 사람이 돼야지

translation.en: Back in the day when I used to walk out on stage,
I wasn't going out there as me. I was someone else.
translation.ko: 난 내가 아니라 특별한 사람이 된 것 같았어

translation.en: I wanted to do my own thing anyway, so…
translation.ko: 난 혼자 하고 싶은 게 있었거든

translation.en: Shall we, uh… work on these lyrics?
Make sure to slap that on the story, fellas.
You know the vibes, engagement, engagement.
Mr. Roberts is ready to see you now.
You can tell the A&R guys, you can tell the publishers, absolutely not.
translation.ko: A&R 직원들한테 전해 배급사에도 절대 안 된다고 해

translation.en: We are not wavering on this at all.
Not even by one percent. You know that, Will.
♪ See right through me With those eyes of brown ♪
♪ Oh my princess without a crown… ♪
They should be done in a second.
♪ Hear her calling, I'm already there ♪
♪ You want anything, just have it all ♪
translation.ko: 원하는 건 전부 다 줄 거야

translation.en: ♪ Think about you when I'm ten feet tall ♪
translation.ko: 시간이 가도 오직 네 생각만 해

translation.en: ♪ Never known a love like this before ♪
I loved it. I loved it. Great sesh, man. Great sesh. Great sesh.
What's happening, bruv? How are you, man? -Hey. Oh, good, yeah.
translation.ko: 잘 지냈어, 친구? - 넌 어때? - 잘 지내지

translation.en: Yeah, just… a song for my daughter. Here, have a seat.
Listen, I'm deep in rehearsal, so I don't have a huge amount of time.
translation.ko: 있잖아 지금 리허설이 한창이라 오래 있기는 힘들어

translation.en: It's cool, I was… just in the area, passing through.
translation.ko: 괜찮아, 근처에 볼일 있어서 지나가다 들렀어

translation.en: Yeah, just thought I'd come and see you.
You sound tight. Well drilled, man
Yeah. Yeah, yeah, yeah. But listen, how are things with you?
Yeah. On top of the world, man.
Um, just working on a new EP,
translation.ko: 지금은 새 EP 앨범 작업 중이고

translation.en: writing some new stuff, and, um… yeah.
I discovered this… brilliant little drummer, actually.
Yeah, and I've got this, uh, gig coming up. It's exciting. It's, uh…
translation.ko: 또 얼마 뒤에 공연이 있어서 기대가 되네

translation.en: just for the fans to… feel what they're feeling.
-I like to do that. It's important. -Yeah.
You, uh… got a new project out, innit?
All systems go here then? Getting ready and that?
Yeah, man, you know. You know yourself, you gotta put in the work.
translation.ko: 맞아, 너도 잘 알잖아 노력이 들어가야지

translation.en: -Dude, I literally say that all the time. -Yeah?
Yeah, I say that to the drummer all the time.
Yeah, you used to say that to the boys back in the day.
translation.ko: 같이 활동할 때 네가 맨날 하던 말이잖아

translation.en: We used to take our lead off you, man.
That was good times though, man.
Best times of our lives, eh?
Listen, man, it's been really nice catching up.
I gotta take a pee before the next rehearsal…
translation.ko: 다음 리허설 전에 화장실에 가야 해서…

translation.en: Then I got a bunch of support acts I gotta talk to.
translation.ko: 오프닝 아티스트가 많아서 얘기도 해야 하고…
오프닝 얘기 나와서 말인데 너한테 할 말이 있어

translation.en: I wanted to talk to you about that. I wanted to show you this, just, uh…
translation.ko: 오프닝 얘기 나와서 말인데 너한테 할 말이 있어 이걸 보여주려고 했는데…

translation.en: I just thought maybe you could come down if you got time or whatever.
You know, man, I'll try my best.
-I really gotta take a pee. -No, it's cool, yeah.
Maybe we should make a new name for it though.
translation.ko: 근데 곡명을 다시 정해야 될 거 같아

translation.en: Come on, man. You're a rock star.
It's about attitude and presence, man. Yeah.
You hear that? They're calling our name, bro.
♪ Seven nights and I never told a soul ♪
♪ Seven nights but I couldn't let it go… ♪
That is a lot of people.
You know, if you change your mind, that's totally fine.
He's going to be fine, all right? He's gonna smash it.
♪ And I never told a soul ♪
♪ Seven nights but I couldn't let it go ♪
♪ Seven nights running isn't long I know ♪
Thank you. Thank you so much. Thank you.
Hey, we got to be quick.
Come on. We gotta set up now.
Sorry, guys. Excuse me, please. Sorry.
Now, it's always good to be a bit competitive with the other acts.
translation.ko: 다른 공연자들이랑 약간의 신경전이 있어야 돼

translation.en: [whispers] I'm just gonna be over there.
Let's hear a massive round for the wonderful Mysie!
translation.ko: 아름다운 마이지를 위해 박수 한번 부탁드립니다!

translation.en: All right, ladies and gentlemen, we have a debut!
translation.ko: 자, 다음 보실 공연은 데뷔 무대입니다!

translation.en: Now, here… here at Peckham's Finest
So from the square, just off Rye Lane,
Just take your time. You go when you're ready.
♪ There's a miracle outside my window ♪
♪ But the frame set on fire ♪
♪ I'll never forget The way it felt that day ♪
♪ When I was young and free ♪
♪ I flew too high, too far for me ♪
♪ Forever young and wild were we ♪
♪ No, there's nowhere in the world I'd rather be ♪
♪ When I was young and free ♪
♪ I flew too high, too far for me ♪
♪ Forever young and wild were we ♪
♪ Now there's nowhere in the world I'd rather be ♪
♪ No, there's nowhere in the world I'd rather be ♪
This next one, you might recognize but, we gave it a little Denham…
translation.ko: 다음 노래는 다들 아실 만한 곡인데 데넘 리믹…

translation.en: We gave it a little Tin Men remix.
♪ There is a house in New Orleans ♪
♪ And God I know I'm one ♪
♪ She sewed my new blue jeans ♪
♪ My father was a gambling man ♪
♪ And it's been the ruin Of many a poor boy ♪
translation.ko: 수많은 가여운 소년들이 인생을 망친 그곳

translation.en: ♪ And God I know I'm one ♪
-[man] Jesus, they're playing another one? -It's about someone I…
translation.ko: - 뭐야, 또 부른다고? - 제가 많이 그리워하는…

translation.en: -[man] Is this for real? -[man 3] Be nice!
♪ Last night I had a dream That we were laughing ♪
translation.ko: 어젯밤 꾼 꿈에서 우린 웃고 있었어

translation.en: ♪ Morning came And like the river, you departed… ♪
translation.ko: 우린 아침이 밝자 두 강줄기처럼 갈라졌어

translation.en: [man] I paid to watch music, not this shit.
translation.ko: 음악 들으러 왔는데 이딴 걸 들려주네

translation.en: [man 5] I'm trying to listen to the band. Shut up!
[man] I don't give a fuck. I'm trying to talk to my mate.
translation.ko: 내 친구랑 말하겠다는데 당신이 뭔 상관이야?

translation.en: ♪ If I could change one thing ♪
translation.ko: 딱 한 가지 바꿀 수 있다면

translation.en: -♪ It would be everything… ♪ -[man] It's rubbish.
[man] Shut up. Music? That's not fucking music, mate.
This prick's brought an ironing board.
-[woman] Shut up! -♪ I keep thinking I see you… ♪
The state of them. Look at them.
-What's wrong with you? -Leave him alone, man!
[Stevie's mum] Vince, what are you doing? Stop!
[Stevie's mum] It's okay. Let's get you home. Come on.
What are you doing, man? What are you doing?
All right, let's get the music back on!
[Austin] Hey, man, let me help you with that.
You know what? Thanks for coming though, yeah.
[Vinnie] Amber, open the door, please. Plea…
-Amber, I'm sorry. Please! Open the door. -What do you think you're doing?
translation.ko: 앰버, 미안해요! 제발 열어봐요! 정신 나갔어요?

translation.en: [Vinnie] I'm sorry. I was trying to help him.
translation.ko: - 미안해요, 도우려고 그랬어요! - 내 말 잘 들어요

translation.en: [Amber] I need you to listen to me now. I gave you a shot and you fucked it up.
translation.ko: - 미안해요, 도우려고 그랬어요! - 내 말 잘 들어요 난 기회를 줬는데 당신이 망쳐버렸어

translation.en: That's on you. Do you understand that?
-I was trying to protect him! -You weren't.
Getting into a fight isn't protecting him.
translation.ko: 싸움 일으키는 건 지키는 게 아니에요

translation.en: -It's time to grow up. -He needs me!
-Vince, nobody needs you. -[woman] Keep it down, please?
translation.ko: 빈스는 아무도 필요로 안 해요 조용히 좀 해요!

translation.en: He's got talent. Amber, he's got talent.
Real talent and you want to let him rot away in his room.
Don't you ever, ever come here again.
And don't you ever try and contact Stevie. I fucking mean it.
translation.ko: 그리고 절대로 스티비한테 연락하지 마요, 진심이에요

translation.en: Right. So where do you want to go when you come out?
[Vinnie] How you gonna pay for that?
Well, I hear you're doing pretty well these days.
'Cause you look like shit, bruv, I bought you something.
translation.ko: 네 꼴이 말이 아니라서 이거 가져왔어

translation.en: Thought it might cheer you up. What?
[mum] I love it when you two play.
[mum] Ted, do you want me to…?
[Vinnie] Now, bring it home for me, bro.
A while. It's a thirty-day tour.
Maybe. I'll still be back for your birthday though, yeah?
translation.ko: 그럴지도 모르지 네 생일 전에 돌아올게

translation.en: -Oh, don't worry about it. -No, bruv, I'll be there. I promise.
translation.ko: - 신경 쓰지 마 - 아니, 꼭 올 거야 약속할게, 알았지?

translation.en: [mum] Oh, that would be lovely, Vinnie.
[mum] Will you definitely be there Friday?
Yeah, Mum, I'll be there. I promise.
[mum] Yeah, we'd really like that. He's… not doing so well.
translation.ko: 그래, 네가 왔으면 좋겠구나 테드 몸이 많이 안 좋아

translation.en: Look, Mum. It's getting kind of crazy here, but I'll see you Friday.
translation.ko: 엄마, 끊어야 될 것 같아요 금요일에 봐요

translation.en: All right, yeah, I love you. Bye. Bye.
Guys, guys, guys, I need to let you into a bit of a secret.
Due to popular demand, we've got another ten more dates.
translation.ko: 뜨거운 성원에 힘입어서 공연 10회 연장이 결정됐다

translation.en: Uh, when does that start, Dennis?
First one is this Friday. Amsterdam.
Um, is there any way we could push that back a bit?
What could be more important than this?
No, it's just that I promised my, uh…
I might need a couple of days to…
We might change our minds about you.
translation.ko: 너에 대한 생각이 바뀔 수도 있어

translation.en: Um, yeah. No, of course. Yeah, I'm there. I'm there.
[driver] Ladies and gentlemen, we've arrived at Hastings.
This service terminates here. Thank you.
I'm sorry that I didn't make it down.
You know how it is, innit?
I was thinking about that harmonica Ted used to play, remember?
translation.ko: 테드가 연주하던 하모니카가 자꾸 생각나는데, 기억하시죠?

translation.en: Think it's still up in the loft?
-It's just, I kind of wanted something… -No, I don't know.
Sure you don't know where it is?
-I told you I don't know. -I'll look myself.
Oh, you can't ambush me like this.
I don't know where it is.
Stevie, I'm talking to you. Can you stop that, please?
translation.ko: 스티비, 엄마 말하잖아! 조용히 좀 해줄래?

translation.en: Can you talk to me, please? What's wrong?
translation.ko: 말 좀 해봐, 왜 이러는 거야?

translation.en: Okay, I know he was your friend.
You don't need him to enjoy music, Stevie.
translation.ko: 하지만 그 사람이 없어도 음악을 즐길 수 있어

translation.en: So I can go to the very good music school.
That's a really big deal, darling. That's a really big deal.
translation.ko: 그건 보통 일이 아니야 정말 어려운 일이야

translation.en: You know, I think that might be a bit much.
translation.ko: 엄마는 그게 너무 힘들 것 같아

translation.en: I think that would be a lot for anybody to take on, okay?
They wouldn't have the care facilities you need.
I don't need them. I want to be like other musicians.
translation.ko: 필요 없어요 난 다른 뮤지션들처럼 되고 싶어요

translation.en: You don't need to be like anyone else.
Okay? You're perfect just as you are.
But if I study, you won't have to look after me anymore.
translation.ko: 거기 가서 공부하면 엄마는 나 안 돌봐도 돼요

translation.en: So you could do other things.
I don't understand that. What…? What do you mean?
You stopped dancing so you could look after me.
translation.ko: 날 돌봐야 돼서 춤을 관둔 거잖아요

translation.en: I really need you to hear this, okay?
I didn't want to be part of that world anymore.
translation.ko: 난 그 바닥을 떠나고 싶어서 그랬어

translation.en: I'm not a child. I don't need you anymore.
translation.ko: 난 애가 아니에요 이제 엄마는 필요 없어요

translation.en: Hey, man. What can I get for you?
You can get me a manager.
All right, just give me one sec.
I'm gonna have to give you this.
We're looking for some cozy venues to do a gig before we go on tour.
translation.ko: 투어 사전 공연을 진행할 아늑한 장소를 찾고 있어요

translation.en: I think we're probably gonna be a bit too small for you, mate.
translation.ko: 우리 매장보다 큰 곳이 필요할 것 같네요

translation.en: All right, have a good night.
I'd like to give you this.
Not much effort in that, is there?
We're, um, looking for some cozy venues to do a gig before we go on tour.
translation.ko: 투어 사전 공연을 진행할 아늑한 장소를 찾고 있어요

translation.en: I don't think this is the venue for you, lad.
I recommend you take a look at that.
This is your band, is it?
Yes it is, with my man Vinnie D, called The Tin Men.
translation.ko: 네, 제 친구 비니 D랑 같이 하는 '깡통들'이에요

translation.en: Yeah, like I said, we're not really booking at the minute.
translation.ko: 근데 지금은 예약을 안 받고 있어

translation.en: You know what? Give me your details and I'll see what I can do.
translation.ko: 좋아, 정보 주고 가면 내가 한번 알아볼게

translation.en: Slow down, man. What are you talking about?
The place is called Bar Star, and the manager's called Marnie.
Bro, I'm sorry for what happened.
I'm sorry for your mum as well, but…
She don't want me hanging around you no more, and
translation.ko: 이제 네 옆에 안 나타났으면 좋겠대

translation.en: to be honest, I can see why.
If you come to the music group, you can say sorry to her face.
translation.ko: 음악 모임에 나와서 직접 죄송하다고 말하세요

translation.en: -Stevie, mate… -Anyway, see you on Thursday. Bye.
Vince, please, just leave us alone, all right?
translation.ko: 빈스, 제발 좀 내버려 두면 안 돼요?

translation.en: Why are you lurking around in the car park?
translation.ko: 빈스, 제발 좀 내버려 두면 안 돼요? 왜 주차장에서 어슬렁거리고 있어요?

translation.en: I'm not some kind of sex offender.
I came to say sorry. That's all.
Yeah, he's apologizing. He's not a sex offender.
You know he put you in danger. You do get that, right?
translation.ko: 널 위험에 빠뜨린 사람이야 너도 알고 있지?

translation.en: He didn't mean to do what he did.
I think you should hear him out.
Both of you, I'm… I'm really sorry.
I made it into a dangerous situation.
Mum, he was trying to protect me.
translation.ko: 엄마, 비니는 날 지키려고 그런 거예요

translation.en: [Dia in distance] Okay. Okay, we are ready to start.
Come on. I think the class is starting.
Take a seat. Quick, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick, quick.
Today, we are going to start with some singing.
Who wants to be the heartbeat today?
Vincent, you should be leader today.
No. Trust me, you don't want me doing that, man.
Who wants Vincent to be leader?
-Do we want Vincent to be leader? -[all] Yes, Dia.
You want me to find the heartbeat?
You can't live without a heartbeat, can you?
translation.ko: 심장이 안 뛰면 살 수 없죠?

translation.en: Except this guy. Am I right?
translation.ko: 저분은 잘만 살 것 같은데 안 그래요?

translation.en: Who's going to sing first then?
I know you've got a beautiful song in there waiting to come out.
translation.ko: 안에 있는 멋진 노래가 나오고 싶어 하잖아요

translation.en: Go on, just… take your time.
I'm going to have to serenade you and we don't want that, do we?
translation.ko: 내 세레나데를 들어야 하는데 그건 싫잖아요

translation.en: She never sang like that for me, you know?
I'm looking for someone to take over for me here.
translation.ko: 내 자리를 맡아줄 사람을 찾고 있는데

translation.en: I want to put your name forward.
-Me, teaching? -My brother, when you got it, you got it.
But when you are good, you can help a lot of people.
translation.ko: 하지만 이 일을 잘해내면 사람들을 도울 수 있죠

translation.en: The joy that comes from teaching through music
is better than any money or success.
You've been busy. Hopefully we'll hear back from one of these soon.
translation.ko: 열심히 준비하셨네요 곧 대답이 올 거예요

translation.en: I kind of had a… offer as well, actually.
Do you know anything about music therapy?
I'm sorry about what happened last time.
Ah, don't be silly, man. It's fine.
To be honest, you had a point.
I could've stepped up for you more back when, uh…
translation.ko: 그때 네 편을 들어줄 수도 있었는데…

translation.en: Anyway, I just got shown a video
of you and your drummer performing at The George.
The sound is really great, man.

translation.ko: 고마워 어쨌든 데니스랑 확인할 때까지 확실한 건 아니지만

translation.en: No promises because I gotta run it by Den, but…
translation.ko: 어쨌든 데니스랑 확인할 때까지 확실한 건 아니지만

translation.en: you're in the mix to take the supporting slot on my tour.
translation.ko: 내 투어 오프닝 공연 명단에 널 올릴 생각이야

translation.en: Would you be free to come down to the studio on Friday for a chat?
translation.ko: 금요일에 스튜디오에서 잠깐 얘기 나눌 수 있겠어?

translation.en: Yeah, let me just, uh, check the old schedule.
I think I can make that.
-All right. Brilliant. -All right. See you then, mate.
Are we playing Bar Star first?
No, man. No, we're going on tour, I want to write something new.
You know, a month ago I couldn't even finish off a verse.
translation.ko: 한 달 전만 해도 1절 하나 못 끝내던 놈이

translation.en: Hey, we need to get your mum on our side, though.
All right, I'll speak to her.
No, no, no, no. Dave, you gave me a chance, right?
translation.ko: 그런 거 아니에요 데이브, 저한테 기회 주셨죠?

translation.en: And I blew it. I'm sorry. I apologize.
Okay, give me 15 seconds and I'll be out of here.
Do you wanna go for a drink with me?
Not here. Not here. Okay, somewhere else. Somewhere nicer.
All right. Dave, it's been emotional.
[Vinnie] Everything's so small from up here, innit?
Hey. Great to see you again, Vinnie.
-When was the last time we…? -Uh, Smash Hits Awards.
translation.ko: - 마지막으로 본 게… - 스매시 히트 시상식이요

translation.en: Fuck me, was it as long as that?
Listen, we want this tour to be huge. Yeah, we need a support act that
translation.ko: 이번 투어는 크게 성공했으면 하거든 그래서 오프닝 공연도

translation.en: has some real meaning to the fans.
I want you to support me on my final tour.
Maybe at the end of your set, I could come on stage and join you?
translation.ko: 네 공연 끝나갈 때 내가 합류하는 건 어떨까?

translation.en: We could do one of the old hits.
I kind of need him 'cause we're The Tin Men, innit?
Yeah, I get it. He's a talent but, um…
Listen, we all know what happened at that pub.
You can't be running that kind of risk, Vince.
translation.ko: 그런 위험을 감수할 순 없어, 빈스

translation.en: You can't have a special needs kid
with zero experience going out drumming on the tour.
translation.ko: 경험도 전무한 아이를 투어에 합류시킬 순 없지

translation.en: I think he'd be all right if he had a bit of support.
[Dennis] All I'm saying is this is about you.
I've got drummers ten times his caliber, you know?
translation.ko: 걔보다 열 배는 잘하는 소속 드러머들도 많단 말이야

translation.en: Ones that can handle the crowds.
You're going to be playing these songs to a massive audience.
translation.ko: 넌 초대형 무대에서 네 곡들을 들려줘야 돼

translation.en: And we all know you've got unfinished business up on that stage.
translation.ko: 네가 무대에 미련 남은 거 알아서 하는 얘기야

translation.en: You might even get an album off the back of it.
translation.ko: 잘만 하면 앨범도 낼 수 있고

translation.en: Don't tell me you don't want that, Vince.
No, of course I do. Of course.
Stevie. I had a meeting with Austin and his manager Dennis yesterday.
translation.ko: 스티비 어제 오스틴이랑 오스틴 매니저 데니스를 만났어

translation.en: They asked me to do the tour by myself.
They just weren't up for it.
I think 'cause me and Austin have got a history,
that's the only reason they want me to go without you.
translation.ko: 너 말고 나만 데려가려는 것 같아

translation.en: I really thought they were going to take a punt on us, mate. I really did.
translation.ko: 난 정말 깡통들을 믿고 기회를 주는 줄 알았고

translation.en: You only get one shot, and that's if you're lucky.
translation.ko: 한 번뿐인 기회조차 잘 주어지지 않아

translation.en: It's a very great opportunity for you.
Yeah but, I don't know if I'm going to do it yet.
translation.ko: 그건 그런데 할지 말지 잘 모르겠다

translation.en: I said to them I'd think about it.
If you have a second shot, then you really have to take it.
There will never be a third shot.
That's wicked, man. What are you gonna do?
I'm going to go to a restaurant for something to eat with my mum
translation.ko: 엄마랑 레스토랑 가서 맛있는 거 먹을 거예요

translation.en: Yeah, man. Yeah, I'd love that.
You going? I'll see you later, Stevie, yeah?
Okay, my friends. Let's start. Are we ready?
You know, I saw Nadeera's mum today.
Everybody misses you at music group, she says.
translation.ko: 음악 모임 멤버들이 널 보고 싶어 한대

translation.en: You know, I still don't understand why you're not going.
translation.ko: 난 네가 왜 안 가는지 아직도 모르겠는데

translation.en: Nah… It's not the same anymore.
♪ But how do I know What you're thinking? ♪
Sure you don't want me to come with you?
-Definitely don't need your sticks? -No, I'm all right. Thank you.
I can do this on my own.
Just have fun. Have a great day, and I'll see you at home.
translation.ko: 오늘은 그냥 재밌게 보내고 이따 집에서 봐요

translation.en: Yeah, okay. Just… turn around. Okay. Go.
translation.ko: 그래, 이것 좀… 여기 봐봐, 됐다, 가

translation.en: [woman] This is our state-of-the-art percussion department.
translation.ko: 여긴 최신식 시설을 자랑하는 타악기 부서예요

translation.en: [woman] This is our world-class concert hall,
which has played host to some of the finest musicians in the world.
-Did Jack DeJohnette play here? -[woman] That's correct.
Yeah. You know, he's going to need some time, I think.
Yeah. It was a… a bombshell for both of us.
translation.ko: 네 우리 둘 다 그 일로 충격을 많이 받았죠

translation.en: Oh yeah? Going on tour with Austin Roberts.
translation.ko: 그래요? 오스틴 로버츠와 투어라니 너무 속상하겠네요

translation.en: I wanted it to be with Stevie.
You must be relieved it's all over now though, hey?
translation.ko: 이제 나랑 다 끝나서 마음이 놓였겠어요

translation.en: Come on, now. I know you've always hated me.
You have managed to bring out something in him
that no one else has been able to do.
I saw how much you meant to him.
Why do you think I agreed to the gig?
Because I saw how bloody brilliant The Tin Men were.
translation.ko: 깡통들이 얼마나 좋은 밴드인지 직접 봤으니까요

translation.en: You know, these days I look at Stevie
and I see these flashes of the man he could be.
translation.ko: 스티비가 장차 될 수 있는 다양한 모습들이 보여요

translation.en: He was sort of stuck, you know.
and watch his head get filled with empty promises. I can't do that.
translation.ko: 헛된 기대감을 갖게 하도록 놔둘 수는 없어요

translation.en: He was never in it to make a name for himself, Vince.
translation.ko: 걔는 자기 이름을 알리려고 공연을 한 게 아니에요

translation.en: All he ever wanted was a friend.
Should have been both of us.
It's Vince Denham on tour and…
-[Amber] Don't say that. -No, I shouldn't do it.
translation.ko: - 그런 말 마요 - 아뇨, 이러면 안 돼요

translation.en: [Amber] Vince, you've wanted this for so long.
But I need you out of his life.
What about his birthday? He asked me if I…
I hope this goes well for you. I really do.
But I've got to draw the line here.
You understand what I'm saying, don't you?
He needs to find his own path now.
translation.ko: 스티비는 이제 자기 길을 찾아야 해요

translation.en: Vinnie, I'll introduce you to Jay and Ryan.
Jay's, uh, producing, and they've been playing around with your tracks
translation.ko: 제이는 프로듀서인데 그동안 네 곡을 뜯어보면서 아이디어를 내고 있었어

translation.en: and coming up with some good ideas.
translation.ko: 그동안 네 곡을 뜯어보면서 아이디어를 내고 있었어

translation.en: I think, you know, making it a little bit more, uh, palatable,
and we ripped the track from a couple of the clips you sent over.
translation.ko: 빈스가 보내준 동영상에서 노래를 추출할 수밖에 없었어요

translation.en: -So it sounds a bit rough. -Yeah, he'll get it. Just play it.
translation.ko: - 그래서 완벽하진 않아요 - 그래 이해할 거야, 재생해

translation.en: It's a bit more current, yeah? Yeah.
♪ There's a miracle outside my window… ♪
Do you reckon we could, uh, dial back the reverb a little bit?
Kind of sounds like I'm in a cathedral or something.
Yeah, I mean, we can talk about all this, but this is the right sound.
translation.ko: 그래, 원하면 의논해도 좋지만 이게 맞는 방향이야

translation.en: This is really good, yeah? Okay.
Guys, uh, I just need to be with Vinnie, uh, for a few moments.
translation.ko: 얘들아 비니랑 단둘이 얘기 좀 해야겠으니까

translation.en: If you could just, uh, leave us, that would be great.
Just gonna leave this with you.
You want me to sign this now?
It's… standard terms. You take your time.
When you've signed it just come and join me and Austin out there, yeah?
We might change our minds about you.
translation.ko: 너에 대한 생각이 바뀔 수도 있어

translation.en: Go on. Let me see it one more time.
Maybe we should frame it. Mm.
Well, I'm bloody proud of you, whether you get in or not.
translation.ko: 합격하든 말든 엄마는 네가 무지 자랑스러워
뭘 해줬다고, 한 번 더 축하해

translation.en: Come on then. Don't be shy.
[Amber] Um, hi? What the hell is going on?
Um, I just wanted to do this just to…
What I'm trying to say is, I think you're banging, man.
translation.ko: 내가 하고 싶은 말은 네가 대박이라는 거야

translation.en: Proper. Not in a weird way, but, like…
♪ When the sun set on me ♪
♪ I'm not too proud to admit ♪
Hey, come on Stevie! We got an empty seat up here, bruv!
translation.ko: 올라와, 스티비! 여기 네 자리 비어 있잖아

translation.en: ♪ Feel the change I feel the change ♪
♪ Feel the change! Feel the change! ♪
